name: Heartbeast's 1-Bit Godot Course: 4) Metroidvania
description:
Part Four of Heartbeast's 1-Bit Godot course found here: https://heartbeast-gamedev-school.teachable.com/p/1-bit-godot-course-by-heartbeast

The largest and most indepth project of the course. Also the final project. Still only about half-way through. More enemies, a boss fight, doors and all kinds of stuff still to come.

Controls:

  • Movement - Left and Right Arrow Keys or A/D
  • Jump - Up Key or W
  • Wall Slide - Down or S
  • Point and Shoot Bullets - Mouse & Left Mouse Click
  • Point and Shoot Missiles - Mouse & Right Mouse Click
  • Pause - E or Escape

Heartbeast's 1-Bit Course Projects

  1. Rocket Launch - Complete
  2. Piggy - Complete
  3. Space Shooter - Complete
  4. Metrodvania - In Progress...

Github Repository: https://github.com/xvcrimsajadevx/Godot-Projects/tree/main/1-Bit%20Course%20-%20...

Further Development: No plans yet, though I may do a project based on what I learned here with my own art.

Bonus Heartbeast content here: Heartbeast's Action RPG Tutorial
